Name: Mordekaiser
AbilityDescription:
Mordekaiser transports the board into his realm for a few seconds, shredding the Magic Resist of all enemies, before summoning a building behind him and slamming it onto the board, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit.

Damage : 500 / 750 / 3000

Magic Resist Shred : 50% / 50% / 70%

Realm Duration : 4 / 4 / 6
